tooltip.descendedangel.messenger_pendant: A gilded pendant once bestowed upon Sacred Gabriel.
tooltip.descendedangel.nanos_lantern.lor: A blessed lantern prayed for by a Saint.
tooltip.descendedangel.alchemy_chain.lor: The divine Authority of BOOST descends.
tooltip.descendedangel.cloud_ring.lore: Born of the Wrath of Heaven, forged by the Dominions.
tooltip.descendedangel.flame_ring.lore: Modeled after Sacred Michael's Sword, the Ring ignites the wearer's foes.
tooltip.descendedangel.cure_ring.lore: The Love and Grace of the Lord cures all your aliments.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t1.lore: A new light ignites the world.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t2.lore: The foundation of a new order.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t4.lore: Light now courses through every remnant of your being.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t5.lore: Willpower shapes light into its truest form.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t6.lore: Illuminate the darkness with your transcendent light.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t7.lore: You stand as a Gateway for the Lord.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t8.lore: With You the Lord begins to move.
tooltip.descendedangel.halo_t9.lore: An attendant of the Lord, You behold His utmost radiance.
altar_jei.halo_t0.name: No Halo Requirements
altar_jei.halo_t1.name: Requires Angel Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t2.name: Requires Archangel Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t3.name: Requires Principality Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t4.name: Requires Power Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t5.name: Requires Virtue Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t6.name: Requires Dominion Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t7.name: Requires Cherubim Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t8.name: Requires Throne Halo or higher
altar_jei.halo_t9.name: Requires Seraphim Halo
ability.descendedangel.space: The Dominion of Space floods Your Divinity.
ability.descendedangel.time: The Dominion of Time floods Your Divinity.
ability.descendedangel.fire: The Power of Fire strengthens Your Divinity.
ability.descendedangel.water: The Power of Water strengthens Your Divinity.
ability.descendedangel.earth: The Power of Earth strengthens Your Divinity.
ability.descendedangel.air: The Power of Air strengthens Your Divinity.
message.descendedangel.shard_already_unl: Your Divinity has traces of this Power already.
